query: affordable clean hotels in Bangkok with breakfast included
title: What are the affordable, clean hotels in Bangkok with breakfast included
excerpt: Navigating the bustling streets of Bangkok to find affordable and clean hotels can be a daunting task, especially when you want to ensure breakfast is included for a perfect start to your day. This curated list highlights hotels that not only meet these criteria but also offer a welcoming atmosphere and convenient locations. By focusing on quality and value, these options will enhance your travel experience without breaking the bank.
intro: Discover the best affordable and clean hotels in Bangkok that offer breakfast included, ensuring a delightful stay in this vibrant city.

hotels.name: Lodge 61 Hotel
hotels.description: Nestled in the bustling Sukhumvit area of Bangkok, Lodge 61 Bed and Breakfast offers guests easy access to entertainment and transportation, including the Major Cineplex Ekamai and Ekamai BTS Skytrain Station. Each room combines comfort and modern amenities, featuring private balconies, free Wi-Fi, and air conditioning for a restful retreat after a day of exploration. With 24-hour front desk services and a prime location, this hotel ensures a seamless and enjoyable stay in the heart of the city.
hotels.highlight: Offers comfortable rooms with private balconies, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary breakfast in the vibrant Sukhumvit area.

hotels.name: The Patra Hotel - Rama 9
hotels.description: The Patra offers a prime location near transportation links, making it an ideal base for travelers seeking easy access to both the airport and central Bangkok. Guests can unwind in contemporary rooms equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning and a kitchenette, ensuring a comfortable stay. Enjoy a delightful buffet breakfast, savor diverse dishes at Maneeya Restaurant, and relax at Patra Lounge with a refreshing drink and soothing ambiance.
hotels.highlight: Features contemporary rooms with air conditioning and kitchenettes, along with a complimentary buffet breakfast at Maneeya Restaurant.

hotels.name: Ton Aor Place Hotel Ratchada
hotels.description: Ton Aor Place Hotel Ratchada offers a prime location in Bangkok's Huai Khwang district, providing easy access to major attractions and shopping centers, perfect for both business and leisure travelers. Guests can enjoy modern amenities such as a 24-hour front desk, complimentary parking, and comfortable air-conditioned rooms equipped with LCD TVs, refrigerators, and free Wi-Fi. Experience a hassle-free stay with thoughtful touches designed to make you feel right at home.
hotels.highlight: Offers free breakfast, comfortable air-conditioned rooms, and a 24-hour front desk in a prime location in Huai Khwang.

hotels.name: MetroPoint Bangkok
hotels.description: Experience breathtaking views and exceptional amenities in one of our 172 modern rooms at MetroPoint Bangkok. Savor authentic Thai cuisine at our on-site restaurant or enjoy the convenience of room service, all while staying connected with complimentary Wi-Fi. Ideally located near popular attractions such as The Mall Bangkapi and Rajamangala National Stadium, our hotel also features versatile event spaces for memorable gatherings.
hotels.highlight: Offers 172 modern rooms, complimentary Wi-Fi, and on-site dining with breakfast options near popular attractions in Bangkok.

hotels.name: The Seasons Bangkok Huamark
hotels.description: Discover the ultimate comfort at The Seasons Bangkok Huamark, where modern amenities meet exceptional service. Relax in one of the 255 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators, minibars, and LED TVs, while indulging in delightful Thai cuisine at the iCafe Restaurant or enjoying room service during cozy nights in. With complimentary Wi-Fi, a 24-hour business center, and convenient self-parking, your stay promises to be both enjoyable and hassle-free.
hotels.highlight: Offers 255 air-conditioned rooms, complimentary Wi-Fi, and breakfast options at the iCafe Restaurant in a clean environment.

hotels.name: The Residence Rajtaevee Hotel
hotels.description: The Residence Rajtaevee Hotel boasts a prime location on Bangkok's bustling Petchburi Road, just steps from popular destinations like Central World and Siam Square, perfect for shoppers and adventurers alike. Guests can enjoy luxurious, spacious rooms complete with modern amenities and unwind at Spa Buri, offering a range of rejuvenating treatments. Culinary enthusiasts will delight in the diverse offerings at Crescendo Restaurant, featuring both Thai and Italian dishes, as well as fresh seafood at Food Cottage.
hotels.highlight: The Residence Rajtaevee Hotel offers spacious rooms, inclusive breakfast, and a prime location near Central World and Siam Square.
